name: Spruce
intro: The swiss army knife for identity and data.
introduce: Spruce is a decentralized identity startup won an RFP from the Ethereum Foundation and Ethereum Name Service (ENS) to develop a standardized “sign-in with Ethereum” feature that enabling users to control their identity with their Ethereum account and ENS Profile instead of relying on a traditional intermediary. SpruceID is an ecosystem of open source tools to enable user-controlled identity anywhere. Kepler is a decentralized storage system that uses smart contracts to define where your data live and who has access.
